featured.text: Most men use more swear words, while far more women use adjectives such as “super” and “lovely,” and exclamations such as “Goodness me!” and “Oh dear!”

definition.zh_def: 善良；美德；良好品質或狀態。
definition.en_def: The quality of being good; moral excellence or virtue.
definition.example: Her kindness and goodness inspired everyone around her.
